sections.heading: 01|Legislative authority may levy tax to compensate free public hospital
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThe legislative authority of each municipal corporation, annually, may levy and collect a tax not to exceed one mill
